verbs.description: it [V: 'll] be a bit warmer this afternoon with rain chances on monday our next cold front will bring us rain overnight into saturday morning we 'll have cool and breezy conditions with clearing skies by saturday afternoon google apple monday twitter tennessee facebook southern valley alabama
